column4: Is my problem so bizarre and retarded that nobody will help me, or am I just being ignored because I'm not interesting enough?!
This has never happened before. When I try to access any site that uses javascript, X crashes. I'm running PPC Ubuntu Breezy. Please help.
It might be flash, but I don't think the hotmail or yahoo mail pages have flash.
is it just x that crashes can you alf+f1 to a terminal?
